name: Noun
description: Represents the different entities in an event: principal, src, target, observer, intermediary, and about. It stores attributes known about the entity.

children.name: administrative_domain
children.description: Domain which the device belongs to (for example, the Microsoft Windows domain).

children.name: application
children.description: The name of an application or service.

children.name: artifact
children.description: Artifacts are pieces of contextual data about entities, such as files, domains, or IP addresses.

children.name: asset
children.description: Information about the asset.

children.name: asset_id
children.description: The asset ID.

children.name: cloud
children.description: Cloud metadata. Deprecated: use entity Attribute instead.

children.name: domain
children.description: Information about the domain.

children.name: email
children.description: Email address. Only filled in for security_result.about

children.name: file
children.description: Information about the file.

children.name: group
children.description: Information about the group.

children.name: hostname
children.description: Client hostname or domain name field.

children.name: investigation
children.description: Analyst feedback/investigation for alerts.

children.name: ip
children.description: A list of IP addresses associated with a network connection.

children.name: ip_geo_artifact
children.description: Enriched geographic information corresponding to an IP address.

children.name: labels
children.description: Labels are key-value pairs. Deprecated: use entity Attribute instead.

children.name: location
children.description: Physical location. For cloud environments, set the region in location.name.

children.name: mac
children.description: List of MAC addresses associated with a device.

children.name: namespace
children.description: Namespace which the device belongs to, such as an AD forest.

children.name: nat_ip
children.description: A list of NAT translated IP addresses.

children.name: nat_port
children.description: NAT external network port number.

children.name: network
children.description: Network details, including sub-messages with details on each protocol.

children.name: platform
children.description: Operating system platform.

children.name: platform_patch_level
children.description: Platform patch level.

children.name: platform_version
children.description: Platform version.

children.name: port
children.description: Source or destination network port number.

children.name: process
children.description: Information about the process.

children.name: process_ancestors
children.description: Information about the process's ancestors ordered from immediate parent to root.

children.name: registry
children.description: Registry information.

children.name: resource
children.description: Information about a resource (e.g., scheduled task, calendar entry).

children.name: resource_ancestors
children.description: Information about the resource's ancestors ordered from immediate parent.

children.name: security_result
children.description: A list of security results.

children.name: url
children.description: The URL.

children.name: user
children.description: Information about the user.

children.name: user_management_chain
children.description: Information about the user's management chain (reporting hierarchy).
